org.eel.kitchen.jsonschema.format

Class AbstractDateFormatSpecifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eel.kitchen.jsonschema.format.FormatSpecifier
      • org.eel.kitchen.jsonschema.format.AbstractDateFormatSpecifier
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DateFormatSpecifier, DateTimeFormatSpecifier, DateTimeMillisecFormatSpecifier, TimeFormatSpecifier

    public class AbstractDateFormatSpecifier
extends FormatSpecifier
    Specialized format validator for date/time checking

    Joda Time is used for date and time parsing: it can handle all defined formats, and catches more errors than the standard JDK's SimpleDateFormat does.

    What's more, unlike SimpleDateFormat, Joda Time's DateTimeFormatter is thread-safe!
